title: Stuck in bronze!
body: Last season I use to be in silver 4, and I got knocked back this season. Need help to get the f{{champion:17}}  out.. {{item:3060}}

replies.body:
These comments make me wanna cry {{item:3070}}  
even if you are just 1% better then average bronze player, you will carry out. the chances of having bad teammates is lower then bad enemies (if your not bad yourself)
Ok, dont think of it as if you are *Stuck* in bronze.. you aint stuck if yourÃ© the only thing holding you back. If you have a 55% win rate (Ranked) then you can climb..

But what if you have a 48% win rate and over 300 ranked games.

Maybe you're not stuck, maybe you're where you belong. :)
You're never where you belong, you can always improve.

Many people don't try, they do the same thing over and over again hoping it will work.

Making the same mistakes that they blame on others (meaning they never learn). They complain and complain asking to others to carry them, to report their team or they ask riot to fix the game.

P.S: That first bit is also described as the definition of insanity but oh well

This is true, 

I used to be a pleb like Chicken, only able to be bronze/Silver level.

But then as you can see by this graph I 'got gud'

2 easy

I'll give you a faceful of pavement and you'll gtfo
i am quite sorry my friend but i know you are very likely to be 15 years of age and weigh less than a small house boar and that means you will not fill my face with pavement my young friend
Dude you can get out man many of my friends were bronze and now they are silver and higher. YOU CAN DO JUST KEEP TRYING.
